data.text: @matthewtrainer @BHRUT_NHS @nnttcurran Go Team Bluebells!!! Team work makes dream work 💖
@matthewtrainer @BHRUT_NHS @nnttcurran Amazing teamwork, in the toughest of times 👏
@2Shirleylind @matthewtrainer @BHRUT_NHS @nnttcurran Masks cannot cause metabolic acidosis, or really any of those.
@matthewtrainer @BHRUT_NHS @nnttcurran Thank you all for all you've done and continue to do! ❤️
@katie_rodd @BHRUT_NHS @nnttcurran Thank you Katie, that’s very kind of you to say. I’m sorry to hear about your Grandma, sending you and your family my condolences.

@matthewtrainer @BHRUT_NHS @nnttcurran Isn't anyone concerned about the risks and long term effects of metabolic acidosis with those facemasks on? Have you done risk assessments re lung damage, acid PH and cancer for starters?
@matthewtrainer @BHRUT_NHS @nnttcurran We are so proud and grateful 🙏
@matthewtrainer @BHRUT_NHS @nnttcurran Amazing team and staff !!! We are grateful for their hard work @NHS_NELCCG @NELHCP
@matthewtrainer @BHRUT_NHS @nnttcurran A brilliant team: proud to work with you guys xx

@matthewtrainer @BHRUT_NHS @nnttcurran A truly inspirational respiratory team. So responsive! So committed. It’s been a rollercoaster & you have been amazing! So proud to be your divisional nurse @BHRUT_NHS
